price: 61. Nabii Yuusuf tooboko Nabii Yuusufuk itteh : nanu kaa koh bahnuh kay abbal kaa esserennooh kaal angicillenno nê luk kaa ruubankeh, diggah nanu woh abennooh, wohuk boolasnu waynam mannu kaak iyyen.
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
